job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: PenguinData Workforce Management Systems, Inc. is currently seeking a full-time Software Engineer with at least 5 years of experience to work remotely with our team. This person will work closely with our Senior Manager of Software Engineering and our Chief Information Officer to create software solutions and focus on the re-platforming of our SaaS solution hosted in AWS. You will work with internal staff to analyze and refine requirements, develop solutions, test and document code. A strong background in application development and services development is required.Â Being authorized to work in the U.S. is a precondition of employment at PenguinData and we do not provide sponsorship for an employment-based visa status at this time.Job Duties:Research, design, and development of new software programs or features on existing productsDevelopment, testing, monitoring and maintenance of Rest and SOAP ServicesAnalysis of user requirementsCode testing, designing, and re-writing (as necessary)Creation of operational documentation with technical authorsWorking closely with other staff (being a team player is a must)Consultation with clients and colleagues concerning the maintenance and performance of software systemsTechnical Qualifications:PHPJavaScriptAWS Cloud9JSONXMLAPI Development/ConsumingRestSOAPSQL (PostgreSQL experience is a plus)Object Oriented Design PrincipalsCode DocumentationGIT RepositoryASP.Net (C#)MVC ArchitectureEntity Framework/ADO.NetVisual StudioBootstrapJQueryUIThe ideal candidate will also have experience with:Android Mobile Application DevelopmentJIRACSSHTML 5QualificationsBachelor's degree or equivalent experience in Computer Science or related fieldDevelopment experience with programming languagesSQL database or relational database skills
